intro: Aneilema subnudum, commonly known as the slender aneilema, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, lance-shaped leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale pink, with five petals and prominent stamens. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in moist forest understories.
